title: How to Sign Up for an Account on Roblox

steps.title: Go to the sign up section below the Login area.
steps.content: Go to the sign up section below the Login area.

steps.title: Fill out all the information.
steps.content: Fill out all the information. If you click Sign Up , you'll also notice that your parent(s) can make an account and log on to Roblox to control your access to Roblox.

steps.title: Once you've created an account, you can customize your Roblox character, try to get badges on Roblox, maybe even decide to design your place, or start playing a Roblox game!
steps.content: Once you've created an account, you can customize your Roblox character , try to get badges on Roblox, maybe even decide to design your place, or start playing a Roblox game!

steps.title: Confirm your email (optional).
steps.content: Confirm your email (optional). Go to the "settings" tab and click "Account", then verify your email. Whether you are 13 or under, or over 14, enter your parents' email.
